Package ohos.data.orm

Class OrmDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.orm.OrmDatabase

  • public abstract class OrmDatabase
extends Object
    Represents object databases.

    An object relational mapping (ORM) database class corresponds to a relational database. Before using an ORM database, you need to create a database class that inherits from OrmDatabase and annotate it with @Database.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    OrmObject
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_APPDATAMGR

      • OrmDatabase

        public OrmDatabase​()

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        public abstract int getVersion​()
        Obtains the database version.

        If you have specified the database version in the @Database annotation, the ORM annotation processor will automatically implement and invoke this method during compilation. In this case, your application does not need to implement and invoke this method.

        Returns:
        Returns the database version.
        Since:
        1

      • getHelper

        public abstract RdbOpenCallback getHelper​()
        Obtains the RdbOpenCallback instance for creating a relational database that corresponds to the current object database.

        If you have specified the implementation class of OrmMigration in DatabaseHelper.getOrmContext(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.Class<T>, ohos.data.orm.OrmMigration...), the ORM annotation processor will automatically read the database version and the implementation class, and generate an instance for creating a relational database that corresponds to the current object database. In this case, your application does not need to implement and invoke this method.

        Returns:
        Returns the RdbOpenCallback instance for creating the relational database.
        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        OrmMigration

      • corruptionHandler

        public void corruptionHandler​(File databaseFile)
        Called when a corruption exception occurs when the ORM database is opened.
        Parameters:
        databaseFile - the file object representing the database on which corruption is detected.
        Since:
        4
